Question
========
  
A one-way ANOVA ("One-Way ANOVA") is performed in a sample of 100 individuals randomly assigned to four conditions of Factor A. The between-group squared sum (SSA) is 400, the within-group squared sum (SSE) is 1000.

Calculate the *F* value. 
Answerlist
----------
* 10.00
* 12.80
* 13.33
* 19.40

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
